feed.title: Zhang Lab
feed.subtitle: Here in the Worm lab, we study the neurobiology of homeostasis where we have a special interest in body fluid balance and cilia diseases. Using multidisciplinary approaches, new tools, and developing novel protocol, we strive to anser the most exciting scientific questions!

entry.title: Welcome!
entry.content: Welcome to the Zhang Lab! We are so excited to explore and share our new discoveries, projects, and data with everyone! Come back to the Worm Lab website for updates on our journey to answer life’s most complex and exciting questions!
entry.summary: Welcome to the Zhang Lab! We are so excited to explore and share our new discoveries, projects, and data with everyone! Come back to the Worm Lab website for updates on our journey to answer life’s most complex and exciting questions!
